title: Cant see Damage Text
body: I have tried unchecking the box, then restarting the game, then reloading into game and rechecking the box . Still cant get it to work. Why is this game so buggy and does anyone have a workaround? Thanks

replies.body:
You likely haven't been able to get your config settings to save correctly for some reason. Let's try resetting all of those settings in a specific way to make sure they stick, then we can go from there.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
